name: objectify
description: Returns form data as a javascript object using the input's name attribute for the key.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && uglifyjs src/objectify.js -o dist/objectify.min.js --source-map dist/objectify.min.js.map --screw-ie8 -c

author: Jim Krayer <jameskrayer@yahoo.com>
